browseCategoryDescription: Explore your endless curiosities in different categories on IQ.wiki, ranging from NFTs, to DeFi, Cryptocurrencies and more.

noOpeningsHeading: There are currently no open positions at this time
recentActivityDescription: Explore recently edited wikis and get updated on the latest information on IQ.wiki across all categories.
loginToolTip: A crypto wallet is an application or hardware device that allows individuals to store and retrieve digital items.

loginConnectorText3: providers or create a new one.
updatesFooterText: Sign up for the IQ Brainlist to get early access to editing on the IQ.wiki site!
visionFooterText: IQ.wiki's vision is to bring blockchain knowledge to the world and knowledge onto the blockchain.
newsletterSubscribeBody: The IQ Ecosystem Report will keep you updated on everything IQ.

SuggestWikiText: Our wiki database is growing to cater to diverse interests in the crypto-space. Have a topic or area that you'd like us to cover? Feel free to suggest wikis!
SuggestionNote: The wiki you just searched is not available. You can send us suggestions for wikis
loginDescription: To login to IQ.wiki, you need to sign a token that will authenticate your account for access.
title: Install IQ.wiki
description: Add IQ.wiki to your home screen for easy access. Navigate to your toolbar and select "Add to Home Screen" or "Install App."
safari_description: Add IQ.wiki to your home screen for easy access. Navigate to your toolbar, click on the share icon then select "Add to Home Screen" or "Install App." option.
